title: Nier vs. Elon Musk - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.18.19
description:
Get $10 off your first order of $15 when you use promo code "KindaFunny" https://grhb.me/kindafunny

Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/games right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

Elon Musk didn't want to credit https://www.artstation.com/mmprod with an image of 2B (our thumbnail) so he quit Twitter (not really). Andrea and Greg discuss and talk all manner of shop!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:29 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
Today, we’re brought to you by Grubhub, Brooklinen and Quip but I’ll tell you about that later.
The Roper Report   -
00:05:16 - Nier: Automata Fan Art Forces Elon Musk Off Twitter
00:08:44 - Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick Pretty Tone Deaf on Unions
00:14:28 - You can change your Stadia Name for free once
00:16:23 - Minecraft Story Mode Re-Listing Woes
00:22:06 - Kojima coming to Comic-Con!
00:23:22 - Bluepoint Games Founder Passes Away
00:24:53 - Out today
00:32:27 -  GrubHub
00:33:47 - Broklinen
00:34:59 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:36:17 - “Has this free-update environment we've cultivated set game devs up for financial loss in the near or distant future?” - Gilly Brums
00:43:35 - “I want to submit an article for Required Reading…” - The Nano Biologist
Required Reading: https://bit.ly/2IpLgIc
00:47:40 - “What is the advantage to a developer, publisher or platform manufacturer of behind-closed-doors demos at E3 and other shows?” - Jonny Samsonite
00:55:46 - “What is Amazon doing?” - Borzen00
00:57:58 - “With E3 now selling tickets to the public, does the swag remain press only?” - Malcontent Ronin
01:00:11 - Squad Up: Robert Mimms - Podcast Services - @RaveLordeNito
01:01:59 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Whitta (edited)
